return this.post("/users/" + userId + "/comments?eventId=" + eventId, comment, "    : ", verbose);
return this.patch("/users/" + userId + "/comments/" + commentId, comment, "   : ", verbose);
return this.patch("/users/" + userId + "/comments/publish?ids=" + ids, null, "   : ", verbose);
return this.patch("/users/" + userId + "/comments/reject?ids=" + ids, null, "   : ", verbose);
async post(path, body, errorText = "   post-: ", verbose=null) {
return this.sendRequest("POST", path, body, errorText, verbose);
async delete(path, body = null, errorText = "   delete-: ", verbose=null) {
this.sendRequest("DELETE", path, body, errorText, verbose, false);
async patch(path, body = null, errorText = "   patch-: ", verbose=null) {
return this.sendRequest("PATCH", path, body, errorText, verbose);
async get(path, body = null, errorText = "   get-: ", verbose=null) {
return this.sendRequest("GET", path, body, errorText, verbose);
async sendRequest(method, path, body=null, errorText = "   : ", verbose=null, returnBody = true, timeout = 0) {
